name: ProEves
description: On the Corporate side ProEves are the largest childcare benefit provider that works with corporates by way of our tech product Procare that provides their employees access to daycares, decision and payment support. We list 7000+ centres across India, and also are building efficiency in the network through our flagship ProEves Edge Centres where we provide Sales, Software & Curriculum partnership to preschool/daycare centres. discovery efficiency, parent counselling, booking support for preschools & daycares.
features: 7000+ centres to choose from a single platform
In-depth information on features, amenities & parent reviews
Access to fee information and exclusive offers
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Proeves is the leading platform for early childhood care and education (ECCE)
ShortDescription: Discover and book the best preschool or daycare near you for your child

Highlights.name: Accessibility
Highlights.description: discovery efficiency, parent counselling, booking support for preschools & daycares.

Highlights.name: Credibility
Highlights.description: standardisation, safety / quality verification, parent references across ProEves Edge centres.

Highlights.name: Flexibility
Highlights.description: multiformat phygital support (physical centre, digital and at home support).

enhanced_description: ProEves is a leading platform for early childhood care and education (ECCE) and is identified as the largest childcare benefit provider for corporates in India. Through its tech product Procare, it offers employees access to a network of over 7000 daycares and preschools across India, providing decision and payment support. The platform facilitates discovery efficiency, parent counselling, and booking support for preschools and daycares. ProEves also builds efficiency in its network via its flagship ProEves Edge Centres, which offer Sales, Software & Curriculum partnerships to childcare centres, enhancing standardisation, safety, and quality verification. The platform aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency.
key_use_cases: Employee access to a network of daycares and preschools
Decision support for selecting childcare (via in-depth information, amenities, and parent reviews)
Payment support for childcare services, including access to fee information and exclusive offers
Booking support for preschools and daycares
Standardization, safety, and quality verification of childcare centers (via ProEves Edge Centres)
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Extensive network of over 7000 childcare centres across India
Comprehensive information on features, amenities, and parent reviews for informed decision-making
Access to fee information and exclusive offers for users
ProEves Edge Centres offering Sales, Software & Curriculum partnerships to childcare centres, fostering standardization and quality
Multiformat phygital support, including physical centres, digital resources, and at-home support
Streamlined discovery efficiency, parent counselling, and booking support
roi_benefits: Enhanced employee satisfaction and retention through comprehensive childcare benefits
Improved employee productivity by facilitating easy access to childcare solutions
Increased efficiency in childcare discovery and booking processes for employees
Access to standardized and quality-verified childcare options for employees
Contribution to accelerating skill development and learning efficiency within the workforce (as per stated business objective)
primary_users: Preschool/daycare centres (as partners of ProEves Edge)
scalability_features: Supports an extensive network of 7000+ childcare centres across India, accessible from a single platform
